sqls.sql: INSERT INTO MAF_USER (USN, USERID, PASSWD, NM,CUST_CD,PIN,HP,EMAIL ) VALUES (seq_usn.NEXTVAL,:userid, :passwd, :nm, :cust_cd, :pin, :hp, :email )

INSERT INTO WCC_LEC_REQ (leccode, userid, lecnumb, pay_type, req_dt, req_stat, req_kind, company_id, req_sdat,req_edat, is_grad, update_dt, update_id ) VALUES (:leccode, seq_usn.CURRVAL, :lecnumb, 'PO', sysdate, 'LP', 'S', :cust_cd, :lec_sdate, :lec_edate, 'N', sysdate, seq_usn.CURRVAL )
